content.raw:
* I think this is a  useful enhancement. The collision log can help in understanding the score outcome.
* ROS API:

    * Pro: collisions would appear in the bag file which can be helpful in debugging. \(eg: noticing relationship between collision and sensor reliability.
    * Concern:  It can be used as a “sensor” while the real wamv does not have a collision sensor attached to it.
content.html:
• I think this is a useful enhancement. The collision log can help in understanding the score outcome.

  • ROS API:

    • Pro: collisions would appear in the bag file which can be helpful in debugging. (eg: noticing relationship between collision and sensor reliability.
    • Concern: It can be used as a “sensor” while the real wamv does not have a collision sensor attached to it.
